name: Ghivalla Soumar
title: Front-End Developer
bio: I'm a front-end developer driven by the intersection of technology, design, and creativity. I love crafting elegant, fluid experiences that bring real value to users. What sets me apart is this combination: the creativity of an artist, the logic of a developer, and the hunger to learn of a true autodidact. I don't just code to build, I code to understand, to improve, and to give life to something meaningful.
differentiator: What sets me apart is this combination: the creativity of an artist, the logic of a developer, and the hunger to learn of a true autodidact. I don't just code to buildâ€”I code to understand, to improve, and to give life to something that didn't exist just moments before.
motto: Curiosity built my path, passion keeps me on it.
